channel.description: Lessons covering Chapter 2: distance, midpoints, gradients, equations of lines, parallel and perpendicular lines, and linear models. Lesson Topic 2A Distance and midpoints 2B The gradient of a straight line 2C The equation of a straight line 2D Graphing straight lines 2E Parallel and perpendicular lines 2F Families of straight lines 2G Linear models 2H Simultaneous linear equations
